headline20: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 10 airports right now.
management45: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 10 airports right now. No engine anti-ice operations are currently flagged. Across base airports: 5 critical, 14 high, 11 medium, 9 normal. Key bases needing attention include Chişinău (RMO/LUKK), Iaşi (IAS/LRIA) and Bucharest Henri Coandă (OTP/LROP); plus 16 other bases. 11 additional base airports are at medium severity and should be monitored closely. At base airports, the dominant pattern is snow-related runway contamination risk, low cloud base and mist  — most notably around Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD), Modlin (WMI/EPMO) and Vilnius (VNO/EYVI). Network hotspots: Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH), Billund (BLL/EKBI), Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD), Lublin (LUZ/EPLB), Modlin (WMI/EPMO) and 5 others. Primary drivers: low cloud base, mist and snow / blowing snow. Expected impact is reduced runway capacity with higher delay and diversion risk, especially where visibility/RVR and cloud base are very low. Since the last update, 12 airports changed status, led by Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH), Billund (BLL/EKBI), Vilnius (VNO/EYVI) and 9 others.
detail90: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 10 airports right now. Base airports (focus): Chişinău (RMO/LUKK) — HIGH: mist; runway contamination risk; cold-temperature performance penalties | Iaşi (IAS/LRIA) — HIGH: mist; cold-temperature performance penalties; visibility down to 1.5 km, cloud base around 200 ft | Bucharest Henri Coandă (OTP/LROP) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 600 m, cloud base around 100 ft | Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD) — CRIT: freezing fog; snow; cold-temperature performance penalties | Craiova (CRA/LRCV) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 50 m, RVR down to 350 m, cloud base around 100 ft; below approach minima (current METAR) | Modlin (WMI/EPMO) — CRIT: freezing fog; snow; runway contamination risk and 13 others. Worst affected now: Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH) — CRIT: mist; snow; runway contamination risk (drivers: approach minima limits, runway contamination / reduced braking, low ceilings) | Billund (BLL/EKBI) — CRIT: mist; snow; cold-temperature performance penalties (drivers: cold-temperature performance penalties, low ceilings, mist) | Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD) — CRIT: freezing fog; snow; cold-temperature performance penalties (drivers: runway visual range (RVR) constraints, cold-temperature performance penalties, very low visibility) | Lublin (LUZ/EPLB) — CRIT: mist; snow; runway contamination risk (drivers: approach minima limits, runway contamination / reduced braking, cold-temperature performance penalties) | Modlin (WMI/EPMO) — CRIT: freezing fog; snow; runway contamination risk (drivers: runway visual range (RVR) constraints, runway contamination / reduced braking, cold-temperature performance penalties) | Poznań-Ławica (POZ/EPPO) — CRIT: fog; visibility down to 200 m, cloud base around 100 ft; below approach minima (current METAR) (drivers: low-visibility procedures (reduced capacity), runway visual range (RVR) constraints, approach minima limits) and 4 others. Changed since last run: Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH), Billund (BLL/EKBI), Vilnius (VNO/EYVI), Birmingham (BHX/EGBB), Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt (BER/EDDB), Aberdeen (ABZ/EGPD), Göteborg Landvetter (GOT/ESGG), Nuremberg (NUE/EDDN), Liverpool John Lennon (LPL/EGGP), Glasgow (GLA/EGPF) and 2 others.
